story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
To tell you the truth, when I heard what
he said...
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
the first thought I had was, “I don’t want to
lose to him.”
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Wanting to win is natural for a Trainer,
but what I felt goes beyond that.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I wonder if it’s because my opponent’s my
own grandson.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: When I first met Benga, I felt the same way.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
But he was also the one who made me
realize my true feelings.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
He’s purer than anyone, and that’s what
makes him so strong.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
His deep connection to his Pokémon comes
from his natural talent.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
or perhaps because he’s influenced by the
many strong Trainers on Pasio...
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
right now, he’s simply barreling ahead in
pursuit of strength, without understanding its
true meaning.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: Is that why you don’t want to lose to him?
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I also used to be relentless when it came
to getting stronger.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
But that was only until I understood all lives
have an end...and strength isn’t something
that remains unchanged forever.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Even if the joy of being with Pokémon
is real...
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Trainers must also understand what the
Pokémon beside them truly want.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
If they focus too much on strength alone and
both Trainer and Pokémon lose sight of
each other...
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2600_10: they won’t know what those needs are.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Pokémon are always by our side.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_2800_10:
But sometimes we make the mistake of
taking that for granted.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I’ve always taught Benga to think about
what strength truly means.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
But when I saw him rushing to grow
stronger, I couldn’t bring myself to tell
him to slow down.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: Not with the power I have now.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
To have righteous power and to teach others
what that truly means.
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Whether Benga can become the kind of
Trainer who can truly walk toward the
future together with Pokémon...
story_arceus_04_02000/2401_1001_3600_10:
probably depends on what he goes through
now.
